page.title: 09Local news in June 1985
page.content: {*}Mrs.Edith Watson died in a road accident when she stepped from behind a parked vehicle into the path of an on coming car.{*}Police are investigating the cause of a local farm fire.It took an hour to bring it under control.It destroyed hay,straw and fertilizer.{*}Copper piping worth Â£67.40 was stolen from a store on a building site last Wednesday in South Elmsall.{*}South Kirkby and Moorthorpe Council Headquarters,The Grove,will be officially opened on July 6th.{*}A healing clinic will be held at South Elmsall Spiritualist Church.{*}The South Kirkby N.S.P.C.C. branch held a coffee evening and raised Â£57.{*}The A.B.C. Organ Society held their monthly meeting to discuss a forthcoming concert.{*}Alsatian dog for sale,pedigree,1\ years old.Â£50. Guard or pet.
